mark battles: i got a dad i just dont know that nigga but imma be a big star and imma show that nigga why you leave me dog you should have stayed all them lies you told and all the games you played i aint tripping nah i aint crying no  more having a convo with you dont cross my mind no more i hope you...let me stop cause the anger got me wasting too much time on stranger thank you a lot you motivated me to be everything you not i work day and night for everything i got passing through life tryna miss the rain i never sell my soul for the price of fame its hard to fall in love when they all the same get the love from all the fans when they cheer my name and im living out the dream so i cant complain do what i can and the rest will change
